Actions.ActionName: ðŸŒŸ MUST POINT TO MACROWHISPER APP
Semaphore - Run only one instance of this macro at the time
We clean up the active icon if current action doesn't have one (blank space is returned)

ElseActions.ActionName: We add a space after current icon

Actions.Text:
tell application "System Events"
	tell process "superwhisper"
		try
			-- Get the submenu
			set theSubmenu to menu 1 of menu item 7 of menu "superwhisper" of menu bar item 1 of menu bar 2
			
			-- Look through all items in the submenu to find one with a checkmark
			set checkedItem to ""
			repeat with menuItem in menu items of theSubmenu
				if value of attribute "AXMenuItemMarkChar" of menuItem is not missing value then
					set checkedItem to name of menuItem
					exit repeat
				end if
			end repeat
			
			return checkedItem
		end try
	end tell
end tell
